title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard of Black Oak, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard of Black Oak
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at center bottom of design: A,  and at lower left: SIDEBOARD / OF BLACK OAK / 5'-6" long   $230
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Sideboard with rounded corners set on an open platform of conforming shape set on molded rectangular support with carved floral garlands; upper section of piece has molded top and flat central section with three horizontal drawers flanked by two carved terminal figures; backsplash with carved cornucopia at right.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard of Black Oak, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-11
